title: BYDOTA Verification Code Query Tool
modal.title: Verification Code Query Successful
modal.content: Please choose one of the following verification codes, which is valid within 3 hours:
form.field.mcu.placeholder: It can be viewed in the multimedia version dialog box, for example: 13.5.5
form.field.imei.placeholder: It can be viewed in the multimedia version dialog box, for example: 123456
form.field.imei.required: Please enter the correct last 6 digits of IMEI
tips: If you need to scan a QR code, please use the BYDOTA QR code assistant. Download link:
